developer_warning: Warning This is a developer page and has not been through user research

header.feedback: You’re viewing a new version of StatsWales. Get support at {{support_email}}.

error.generic: You could not be logged in. Try again later.
error.expired: Your session has expired. You need to sign in again.

form.notice_1: The username we've given you is temporary. You'll only be able to log in with it whilst we run this round of testing.
form.notice_2: Do not upload any sensitive data or data that other StatsWales users should not have access to.

key_information.heading: Main information
key_information.no_source: No specific source from data provider
key_information.next_update_missing: Publish date or update frequency not entered yet
key_information.not_updated: This dataset will not be updated

dataset_view.table_note: This is not shown in the consumer view

cube_preview.panel: This is a preview of this dataset.
cube_preview.heading: Main information

start.title: Create a new dataset
start.p1: To create a new dataset, you'll need:
start.data_table: a data table containing data values and references to all relevant dimensions
start.lookup_table: any user-generated lookup tables you need to include (if relevant)
start.metadata: metadata about this dataset, in the language in which you're viewing this service

dimension_name.heading: What should this dimension be called on the StatsWales website?
dimension_name.concise: concise and clearly explain what the dimension contains
dimension_name.language: entered in the language in which you're viewing this service

dimension_type_chooser.heading: Add reference data
dimension_type_chooser.question: What kind of data does this dimension contain?

time_dimension_chooser.heading: Set up dimension containing dates
time_dimension_chooser.question: What kind of dates does the dimension contain?

chooser.period-hint: For example, months or years for which data values apply to
chooser.point-hint: For example, specific dates when data values were collected

lookup_table_review.heading: Check the lookup table
lookup_table_review.showing: Showing a sample of {{rows}} of {{total}} rows.
lookup_table_review.confirm: By continuing, you confirm the lookup table is correct.
lookup_table_review.change_dimension_type: Change what kind of data this dimension contains

measure_review.heading: Check the measure table
measure_review.showing: Showing a sample of {{rows}} of {{total}} rows.
measure_review.confirm: By continuing, you confirm the measure table is correct.

time_dimension_review.heading: Confirm the dates are correct
time_dimension_review.showing: Showing a sample of {{rows}} of {{total}} rows.
time_dimension_review.confirm: By continuing, you confirm the dates are correct.

period-type-chooser.heading: What are the shortest periods in the dimension?

year_type.heading: What type of year does the dimension represent?

year_format.heading: What format is used for years in the dimension?

quarter_format.heading: What format is used for quarters in the dimension?
quarter_format.heading-alt: What format is used for quarterly totals?
quarter_format.fifth_quarter: Is a fifth quarter used to represent yearly totals?
quarter_format.fifth_example: For example, 2024Q5 to represent the total for 2024

month_format.heading: What format is used for months in the dimension?

measure_match_failure.heading: Measure lookup table data cannot be matched to the data table
measure_match_failure.information: {{failureCount, number}} references in the dimension do not match the references in your measure lookup table. You should check:
measure_match_failure.formatting: the reference codes used in the data table are correct
measure_match_failure.choices: you selected the correct lookup table for your measure

dimension_match_failure.lookup_heading: Lookup table data cannot be matched to the data table
dimension_match_failure.heading: Reference data cannot be matched to the data table
dimension_match_failure.lookup_information: {{failureCount, number}} references in the dimension do not match the references in your lookup table. You should check:
dimension_match_failure.ref_information: {{failureCount, number}} references in the dimension do not match the the category of reference data you selected. You should check:
dimension_match_failure.formatting: the reference codes used in the data table are correct
dimension_match_failure.choices: you selected the correct lookup table
dimension_match_failure.subheading: Reference codes that cannot be matched
dimension_match_failure.ref_choices: you selected the correct reference data category
dimension_match_failure.upload_different_file: Upload corrected or different data table
dimension_match_failure.upload_different_file_warning: (This will remove reference data from all dimensions)
dimension_match_failure.no_matches: None of the dates matched the format supplied

period_match_failure.heading: Date formatting cannot be matched to the dimension
period_match_failure.information: {{failureCount, number}} date codes in the dimension do not match the date formatting you have indicated. You should check:
period_match_failure.formatting: all date codes in the dimension are correct
period_match_failure.choices: you indicated the correct date formatting
period_match_failure.subheading: Unique date codes that cannot be matched
period_match_failure.upload_different_file: Upload corrected or different data table
period_match_failure.upload_different_file_warning: (This will remove reference data from all dimensions)
period_match_failure.no_matches: None of the dates matched the format supplied

title.heading: What is the title of this dataset?
title.appear: This is the title that will appear on the StatsWales website
title.descriptive: It should be short, descriptive and unique

title.hint: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

error.missing: Enter the title of this dataset
error.too_long: The title of this dataset must be 1,000 characters or less
error.too_short: The title of this dataset must be 3 characters or more
error.unique: The entered title is already in use for a currently published dataset. Enter a unique title for this dataset.

summary.heading: What is the summary of this dataset?
summary.explain_1: what this dataset is about and what it shows
summary.explain_2: this dataset's dimensions and why they've been used, if needed
summary.language: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

error.missing: Enter the summary of this dataset

collection.heading: How was the data collected or calculated?
collection.explain: In short, simple sentences explain either:
collection.explain_1: the methodology used to collect the data
collection.explain_2: the methodology used to calculate the data
collection.language: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

error.missing: Enter how the data was collected or calculated

quality.heading: What is the statistical quality of this dataset?
quality.explain_1: any issues or methodological changes related to this dataset including any:
quality.explain_1a: notes relevant to all data values in this dataset
quality.explain_1b: custom explanations needed to clarify any note codes used
quality.explain_2: a high-level summary of the statistical quality report, if available
quality.language: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

error.missing: Enter the statistical quality of this dataset

rounding_applied.heading: Has rounding been applied to the data values?

yes.label: Yes
yes.note: In short, simple sentences explain what rounding has been applied.

error.missing: Select whether any rounding has been applied to the data values

rounding_description.label: In short, simple sentences explain what rounding has been applied

error.missing: Enter what rounding has been applied to the data values

update_frequency.heading: Will this dataset be regularly updated?

error.missing: Select if this dataset will be regularly updated or not

frequency_value.label: Enter the period between updates. For example, 1 year.

error.missing: Enter the number of weeks, months or years for the period between updates
Select whether the period between updates is in weeks, months or years

add.heading: Add a link to a report

link_url.label: Link URL
link_url.hint: This should start with either 'https://' or 'http://'

error.missing: Enter the link URL for a related report
error.invalid: Enter the link URL in the correct format

link_label.label: Link text to appear on the webpage
link_label.hint: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

error.missing: Enter the link text to appear on the webpage for a related report

add_another.heading: Do you need to add a link to another report?

error.missing: Select yes if you need to add a link to another report

add.heading: Add a data provider
add.explain: If you cannot find the data provider in the list, you can request a data provider be added.

provider.hint: Start typing or select from the list

error.missing: Select a data provider from the list of data providers

add_source.heading: Add a data source from the selected data provider

no.label: No specific source from data provider

error.missing: Select whether to select a source or indicate there is no specific source from the data provider

source.note: If you cannot find the source in the list, you can request a data source be added.
source.hint: Start typing or select from the list

error.missing: Select a source from the list of sources for the selected data provider

table.no_source: No specific source from data provider

add_another.heading: Do you need to add another source?

error.missing: Select yes if you need to add another source
Select how this dataset is designated

topics.heading: Which topics are relevant to this dataset?

error.missing: Select which topics are relevant to this dataset

schedule.heading: When should this dataset be published?

error.invalid: The date this dataset should be published must be a real date
error.past: The date this dataset should be published must be in the future

day.label: Day
day.error: The date this dataset should be published must include a day

month.label: Month
month.error: The date this dataset should be published must include a month

year.label: Year
year.error: The date this dataset should be published must include a year

time.label: Time
time.hint: This will be 09:30 by default. Only change this if a different publication time is needed. Use 24 hour clock format, for example 15:00.

error.invalid: The time this dataset should be published must be a real time

hour.label: Hour
hour.error: The time this dataset should be published must include an hour

minute.label: Minute
minute.error: The time this dataset should be published must include a minute

error.saving: Publish date could not be saved. Try again later.

team.label: Team
team.note: If you cannot find your team in the list, or your team name has changed, you can request a team be added or changed.

error.saving: Team could not be saved. Try again later.

file.label: The file should be in CSV, JSON or Parquet format

errors.api: The selected file could not be uploaded. Try again.

preview.heading: Check the data table
preview.preview_summary: There are $t(publish.preview.columns, {"count": {{cols}} }) and $t(publish.preview.rows, {"count": {{rows}} }) in your upload.
preview.upload_summary: There are $t(publish.preview.columns, {"count": {{cols}} }) and $t(publish.preview.rows, {"count": {{rows}} }) in the data table. $t(publish.preview.columns, {"count": {{ignored}} }) in the uploaded file have been ignored.
preview.confirm_correct: By continuing, you confirm the data table is correct.
preview.revisit_question: What do you need to do?
preview.upload_different_hint: Warning: This will reset and remove all measures and dimensions
preview.change_source: Change the definition of what each column in the data table contains
preview.change_source_hint: Warning: This will reset and remove all measures and dimensions

sources.heading: What does each column in the data table contain?

metadata.title: Title
metadata.update_frequency: How often this dataset is updated

publishing.when: When this dataset should be published

submit.subheading: By continuing, you confirm that all data and metadata has been checked and is correct.

change_data.title: What do you need to do?
change_data.note: The file should be in CSV, JSON or Parquet format

change_table.label: Upload a different data table
change_table.description: This will remove reference data from all dimensions

change_columns.label: Change what each column in the data table contains
change_columns.description: This will remove reference data for any columns that contain dimensions that you change

scheduled.what_next: What do you want to do?

buttons.view_published_dataset: View published dataset (opens in new tab)

error.withdraw: Could not withdraw dataset from publication. You should contact support.

update_type.heading: What do you need to do?
update_type.add_revise: Add new data and revise existing data

errors.missing: You need to select the type of update you wish to make

import.heading: Import translation file
import.note: You can only import the translation file if it has been fully populated.

file.label: The file must be in CSV format

error.missing: Select the populated translation file to upload
error.invalid: The selected file must match the required format
error.values: The translation file must be fully populated for both languages

error.no_datasets: No datasets are currently listed in the database. If you need help, contact a member of the development team.

error.no_dimensions: This dataset has not been completed with dimensions
error.no_revisions: This dataset has not been completed with revisions

confirm.missing: You need to confirm or reject the uploaded file using the buttons at the end of the preview

session.current_dataset_missing: A data table cannot be found. Try uploading a data table.
session.current_revision_missing: A data table cannot be found. Try uploading a data table.
session.current_import_missing: A data table cannot be found. Try uploading a data table.
session.no_sources_on_import: The selected data table does not contain any dimensions. Check the data table is correct.

sources.unknowns_found: Select what each column in the data table contains
sources.multiple_datavalues: There should only be one column in the data table for data values. Check you've selected the correct options or check the data table is correct.
sources.multiple_footnotes: There should only be one column in the data table for note codes. Check you've selected the correct options or check the data table is correct.
sources.dimension_creation_failed: Dimensions could not be created. Check you've selected the correct options or check the data table is correct.

preview.failed_to_get_preview: Table preview could not be generated. Check you've added reference data to all dimensions or the data table is correct.
preview.remove_error: Uploaded file could not be removed from the server. Try again or contact support.
preview.confirm_error: Confirm or reject the uploaded file
preview.revision_missing: A revision is missing from this dataset
preview.import_missing: An import is missing from this dataset
preview.invalid_download_format: Select whether to download dataset as CSV, Parquet, Excel or DuckDB
